content.en: Fluorescence Enhancement: Scientists have been exploring various algorithms to improve the efficiency and accuracy of fluorescence molecular tomography reconstruction. These algorithms, such as L1 regularization-based algorithms, total variation regularization-based algorithms, and greedy algorithms based on truncated singular value decomposition conversion, aim to enhance the resolution and sparsity of the reconstructed images. By combining different regularization methods and iterative techniques, researchers hope to achieve better spatial and temporal resolution in fluorescence molecular tomography.
content.da: Fluorescensforbedring: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af fluorescens molekylær tomografi rekonstruktion. Disse algoritmer, såsom L1-reguleringbaserede algoritmer, algoritmer baseret på totalvariation regulering og grådige algoritmer baseret på trunkeret singulærværdidekomposition, sigter mod at forbedre opløsningen og sparsheden af de rekonstruerede billeder. Ved at kombinere forskellige reguleringsmetoder og iterative teknikker håber forskere at opnå bedre rumlig og tidsmæssig opløsning i fluorescens molekylær tomografi.
